plot: A struggling young olive farmer resorts to desperate measures following rumours of gold on his property. He will either hit rock bottom or strike gold.
title: Orange Gold
plot_es: A struggling young olive farmer resorts to desperate measures following rumours of gold on his property. He will either hit rock bottom or strike gold.
